summary: This document appears to be a list of records and documentation related to the administrative detention and death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It includes references to his personal property, medical and psychological records, suicide watch logs, and materials concerning his cellmate Efrain Reyes, along with various administrative logs and reviews.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (implied from context of inmate records and SHU)
keyFacts: The document lists extensive records related to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration, including an Administrative Detention order dated July 29, 2019.
It references specific logs covering the periods of July 8-10, 2019 and July 24-30, 2019, including Psychology Observation logs and Suicide Watch Chronological logs for July 23 & 24, 2019.
Efrain Reyes is identified as Epstein's cellmate, and separate documentation (court, SHU file, logs) exists for him.
The document includes various administrative logs such as TRUSCOPE search logs, attorney conference logs, and staff memos, indicating a post-incident review of procedures and access.
The file label 'EFTA00127392' and reference to a press release suggest this is part of a formal records collection or investigation file.
